group_1.narration: {Alright, who knows how many of you are out there listening, @but today, we’ll once again hijack the waves far and wide @to bring you Pirate Radio Central!}
{And of course, the next song has just got to be@ from Kamihama City’s own, the cosmic, local idol Sayu-Sayu.@ This is Fumino Sayuki’s “Dethroned☆Innocence”!}

group_1.textLeft: ...Even though they said it so straightforwardly, @what the heck is a cosmic, local idol?
Are they from outer space? Are they local? @...Which is it?

group_1.textRight: This station has been nothin’ but Sayu-Sayu lately.

group_1.textLeft: I think it’s nice, but maybe they’re being a little @biased.

group_1.narration: {By the way, you there, sitting in front of the radio!@ It’s about time you noticed!}
{Since Kamihama City HQ is Sayu-Sayu’s rabid number one fan,@ us underlings have no song selection privileges!@ Broadcast freedom means @ about as much as a candle in the wind!}

group_1.textRight: ...You’re just gonna make up excuses!?

group_1.textLeft: Where is this “Kamihama City”...?

group_1.textRight: I wonder if it’s on the navi device. Lemme check.

group_1.textLeft: None!?

group_1.textRight: What the heck is goin’ on...
...By the way, why did ya stop the bike?

group_1.textLeft: Isn’t there a fork in the road up ahead?

group_1.textRight: Ahh, I see, we haven’t decided where to go yet.

group_1.textLeft: Lend me the device for a bit.

group_1.textRight: Here ya go.

group_1.textLeft: On our right is “Library Town”. To the left is the @“Village of Meetings and Partings”...
Which way should we go?

group_1.textRight: Ain’t either one fine?

group_1.textLeft: Well, we were planning on stopping by both, so it’s about which one to visit first.

group_1.textRight: Let’s try to go where there’s more people.
I wanna refill on fuel.

group_1.textLeft: And that’s that! Here, I’m returning the device.

group_1.textRight: Ya didn’t have to rush to return it though?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:120301:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:120301:cheek_0][chara:120301:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json:motion_0][chara:120301:lipSynch_1]It’s ‘cause I’m driving and Felicia’s navigating!

group_1.textRight: ...We did decide how to split this from the very beginnin’ of our trip.

group_1.narration: -Felicia-@ The “Wishin’ Star” is in this direction, ain’t it?
-Tsuruno-@ That’s wrong, it should be this way. The map’s upside-down.
-Felicia-@ I don’t get how to read this.
-Tsuruno-@ You’re the navigator, so you’re gonna have to learn fast!

group_1.textRight: Back then,
we still had Super Reindeer-san #1, didn’t we.

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah, it’s been a long time since then.
I had a lot of fun when I was still at Banbanzai,
but I wondered if it was okay to just keep living my 50-point life as I had been.
And then the two of us left on our journey...

group_1.textRight: ...The two of us
don’t have any memories from before we came to Banbanzai.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah.
I thought we were the only ones,
but that was the case for all the girls we met in @every town.

group_1.textRight: ...”Somethin’” must have happened before I came @to this world.
I can’t remember, but I know I’m not wrong...

group_1.textLeft: I’m sure you’ll remember, if we can just get below @the Wishing Star!

group_1.textRight: That’s right!
Then let’s hurry up and decide.

group_1.textLeft: Decide what?

group_1.textRight: Whaddaya mean what... @The next place!
If ya don’t hurry up and decide...
[chara:120302:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...Hm?

group_1.textLeft: What happened?

group_1.textRight: I heard a weird voice...?

group_1.textLeft: It’s the radio, isn’t it?

group_1.textRight: No! It’s like... comin’ from inside my head...

group_1.textLeft: ...It’s true! What is this?
They’re... not words...
...but some sort of intent’s being conveyed.

group_1.textRight: Maybe... this is a message from an angel...?

group_1.textLeft: I’m sure it is!
What, what? Where should we go next...?

group_4.textLeft: What, what? Where should we go next...?
